summary: A simple talking dog mod. The mod includes 2 spell, capable of turning NPCs in werewolf or dogs permanently.
descriptionHtml:
After my best friend's dog Lucky died, I felt sad. So I imagined he would like to see an immortal version of Lucky, one that can still play with him in the magic world of Skyrim. And since Lucky was a white haired bastard he looked like Skyrim's default dogs, so the feeling of it is real.
Lucky is located in the Drunken Huntsman, Whiterun. In his inventory you will find two spell books. These spells can transform any NPC in a werewolf or a dog, and this is permanent. It was created to be used with Lucky, so that you can transform him into a werewolf during the toughest battles and revert him afterwards.
This mod has no compatibility issues. I use it with a ton of mods in my personal Skyrim, some affecting werewolves and companions.
If you are in need of a nice, friendly, brutal talking dog, here you are.
Remember, Lucky is balanced in combat, but is essential.
author: GreatBugio
